title: [Question] SkiaSharp with SDL2
body:
I have tried to use SkiaSharp with GLFW CS binding that works fine. But when I have tried to use with SDL2 CS binding then it cannot create GLInterface. Used library https://www.nuget.org/packages/SDL2-CS.NetCore/

Does SkiaSharp work with SDL2 cs binding? If it does not work then have any plan for it?
